content:
I recently discovered 3 equations in the “Notes on Fields” section of the EOB pages in Carin. The equations are:

(1) Eligible amount = submitted amount - the noncovered amount – discount

(2) member liability = deductible + coinsurance + copay + noncovered

(3) payment amount = eligible amount - the member liability

For us equations (1) and (3) are particularly problematic.

Question: Is it okay for our claims to violate these 2 equations in FHIR? Our client's claims processing system does not work the way FHIR expects and they would like to largely disregard these 2 equations. Will that be a problem?
@ava1uphealth CARIN has provided those equations as guidance, could you please advise as to what parts of the equations you differ on? @Pat Taylor @Amol Vyas @Mark Roberts
